The public has lukewarm views in terms of how the various sides of the debate over Capitol handled themselves for example President Trump Senate Republicans and Democrats and the FBI ... approval rating from thirty two percent or less of survey respondents
A rocket scheduled to lift off tonight from Europe space port in French yawn up as NPR's Joe Palca reports it will carry a spacecraft headed for mercury the European space agency mission is known as ... Colombo it will take a circuitous routes to the innermost planet in our solar system flying by earth once Venus twice and mercury itself six times
Before being able to go into orbit
The entire journey will take slightly more than seven years
Once that mercury the spacecraft actually separates into two probes one supplied by the Japanese space agency will make measurements of Mercury's magnetic field the other will orbit closer to the planet studying among other things the ice deposits that have been spotted at the poles of an otherwise extremely hot planet
